actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that buildings constructed for use by the U.S. Postal Service shall be designed and constructed in a manner making them accessible to the physically handicapped.

summary.text: Provides that buildings constructed for use by the United States Postal Service shall be designed and constructed in a manner making them accessible to the physically handicapped.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that buildings constructed for use by the U.S. Postal Service shall be designed and constructed in a manner making them accessible to the physically handicapped.
